Title: SQL Injection in TYPO3 Frontend Login
Description: Failing to properly escape user input, the frontend login component is vulnerable to SQL Injection. A valid frontend user account is needed to exploit this vulnerability.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 6.2.0 before 6.2.26, all versions starting from 7.6.0 before 7.6.10
NotImpacted: All versions before 6.2.0, all versions starting from 6.2.26 before 7.6.0, all versions starting from 7.6.10
